//: Spell combo imitating how a fungus infect others in-action, but slowly damages instead of an instant convertion. This process takes too much space to combine with secro_magic.json file.
description:
Target spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster locks its line of sight onto the target, then casts the Spell(s).'

//: Note that we are replacing the target, and in this process, we'll need to kill them... then they'll drop their loots (corpse included). There's no spell to prevent that, so flesh variants have special flag that absorbs items (which then clears dropped items immediately after the infection).
//1: This will convert normal (or has a minor ability/characteristics such as swimmer) zombies into a regular flesh zombie.
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster will try to infect the target by dealing 25 biological damage. If the target dies, they succumb to the flesh.'

//: Spams 'failed to place monster' message until it succeeds. Becomes very annoying when tons of monster uses the spell at a single target.
description:
Spell casted by a monster. If you're seeing this, then read this one instead:
'Caster infects the target, turning them into a crimson horror.'
